title: The Kanro Ella en Ella - Hotels.com
description: View deals for The Kanro Ella, including fully refundable rates with free cancellation. Suwadivi Ayurveda Health Care is minutes away. Breakfast, WiFi, and an evening social are free at this B&B. All rooms have fireplaces and balconies/patios.
